bwwExcerpt: Nottage and director and choreographer Christopher Wheeldon have one of the greatest music catalogues in the world and yet don't seem to know how to handle it. Some pivotal songs - like "For the Love of Money" by The O'Jays - aren't by Jackson at all. And a large bulk of Jackson's songs used - inclu...
